description: Create new free/premium cloud wallet accounts with the form below!
genPassAbout: The generated password was created by your client. No one but you has access to it. Paste it below and save a copy in a safe place!
faucetMethod: Public Faucet Registered Account (Basic free account)
confirmPasswordDescription: Please confirm that you have written down your password.
loseAccess: I understand that I will lose access to my funds if I lose my password
noRecovery: I understand that no one can recover my password if I lose or forget it
writtenDown: I have written down or otherwise stored my password
invalidUsername: You've provided an invalid username, please try again.
faucetError: There was an error registering your account. Please try again later.
